title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Hello all,I work full time Monday - Friday and trying to come up with a way of making some extra money each week, either after work or on weekends. I do not have the option of working overtime unfortunately otherwise I would. Even if I was to bring in an extra Â£30-Â£50 per week, It would be something extra I can invest into crypto whilst we are experiencing these low prices. Any ideas?

comments.author: VKcams.com
comments.body: Shot the 1080p videos and sell them on Pond5.

comments.author: MaryMany
comments.body: Now is the right time to buy cryptocurrency

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I think a side hustle is a great way to supplement your income. I usually recommend to people not to quit their day job just yet because some side hustles can take time to see good returns. First, if you have a housing and live in a desirable area, I recommend looking sites like Airbnb. Iâ€™ve made a good deal of money off renting rooms or my whole place out. Second, I recommend turning a passion into cash. It can be either digital or analog. If your more digitally focused I would look into sites like Upwork to sell your services. And, if you can make something with your hands, I would look into Etsy for selling your products.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: amazon mturkyou can make like 40~70 USD/week, if you give 2~3 hours daily

comments.author: welner
comments.body: Well, it all depends on what you know, and try to make money on that, there are a lot of online games where you can sell game values to earn money

comments.author: Stacaato
comments.body: Virtual assistance is a great choice. There are many opportunities that have been sprouting up since the pandemic. You can also go for technical writing if you have some basic idea about technology and loves decoding tough subjects and writing them into simpler ones.

comments.author: Joswa Russell
comments.body: Freelancing. But there are other ways to make money, and some weird ways. I have seen hand models for instagram. Touch specialist is another lol.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Contact a dent repair company or body shop and become a salesman. It's easy to find leads (anyone with dents on their car) and you can earn decent commission around $500 per new customer.Or start a pressure washing business.

comments.author: Detritus
comments.body: I have three ideas running on my mind already. (1) you can accept orders from people and delivery to their homes and get paid for it. (2) you can visit neighbors and help them do their laundry ðŸ§º and you could get paid for your service. (3) you can help some family do their grocery.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Upgrade and learn some new tech skills that you can buy on Udemy.

comments.author: Laurendaldin
comments.body: Pay attention to remote recruiter & remote HR jobs. Some of them do not require special skills - mostly vacancies for recruiters - and you can work several hours a day
